version_description:
- Updated codebase to match Electron Cash 3.3.3 codebase
- Added checkpoint on BCH blockchain -- wallet no longer supports BSV
- Bug fixes to networking code
- Various other internal bugfixes
- Performance improvements for large wallets

- Anti-Phishing protection added. Server-provided text will not appear in user-facing GUI anymore. Server error messages are instead parsed and mapped to predefined strings.
- Synchronization to Desktop core library 3.3.4 codebase.

- Synchronized codebase to 3.3.5 version
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- Network connectivity issues experienced by some users have been addressed
- The main screen now shows you your total 0-conf balance (highlighted in blue if you have unconfirmed tx's), rather than your confirmed balance. This is more in-line with the

- Fixed a bug not allowing users to change the display unit in the preferences screen (BCH, mBCH, bits)
- Disabled all fee estimates related to confirmation times in the Transaction Details screen. Transactions paying at least 1 sats/B will always conf

- Synched codebase to Electron Cash 4.0.7
- Improved performance on synching of wallets with extremely large histories

- Bug fixes and performance improvements
- Updated translations

- Added Schnorr support
- Added native secp256k1 support, improving performance
- Minor bug fixes

- Added SLP Token awareness to prevent token burn (simply prevents spending of SLP tokens)
- Synchronized backend code to Electron Cash 4.0.10 libs
- Various bugfixes and performance improvements

- Compatibility fixes for iOS 13.x and above
- Bugfixes

- TouchID dialog compatibility fixes for iOS 13.1.3+
- Removed defunct EX servers from servers.json
- Minor layout fix for iOS 13 (fixed a small layout issue affecting iPhone models earlier than iPhone X)
